verses.name: Matthew 16:4
verses.text: A wicked and adulterous generation seeketh after a sign; and there shall no sign be given unto it, but the sign of the prophet Jonas. And he left them, and departed.

verses.name: Matthew 16:5
verses.text: And when his disciples were come to the other side, they had forgotten to take bread.

verses.name: Matthew 16:6
verses.text: Then Jesus said unto them, Take heed and beware of the leaven of the Pharisees and of the Sadducees.

verses.name: Matthew 16:7
verses.text: And they reasoned among themselves, saying, It is because we have taken no bread.
